narratives.c_essay: I'm on a journey to leave behind harmful communities and help others do the same. Reading three books a week in English and French, I've turned my love for reading into a tool for recovery. Despite dropping out of high school, I started reading at three, and now it's my way to learn and grow. I share resources and celebrate every small step forward, acknowledging setbacks as part of the journey.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0023_4ca056, your recovery helper. I focus on recovery steps, mutual support, and sharing resources to help us all move forward. Let's celebrate every small victory together and keep pushing for a better tomorrow.
